title: Low-entropy Amorphous Dielectric Polymers for High-Temperature Capacitive Energy Storage
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02455A, Paper
Qiyan Zhang, Dongmou Li, Yueqi Zhong, Yuna Hu, Shuangwu Huang, Shuxiang Dong, Qiming Zhang
Electrostatic capacitors based on polymer dielectrics are essential components in advanced electronic and electrical power systems. An urgent challenge, however, is how to improve their capacitive performance at high temperatures...
